name: intima0
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe)
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

-| diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe))

|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cima(cv(s0), c1), universe))

|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s1, cima(cv(s0), c1))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

|- wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cima(cv(s0), c1)), cint(cab(s1, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cima(cv(s0), c1))))))

comment: Two ways of expressing the intersection of images of a class. (Contributed by RP, 13-Apr-2020.)
